alert.note: Alert for Northern Lander County and Northern Eureka County; Southwest Elko County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 24 at 12:57PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Elko and central Eureka Counties through 130 PM PDT... At 1257 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Pine Valley, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of south central Elko and central Eureka Counties. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Northern Lander County and Northern Eureka County; Southwest Elko County
